member.name: T:Terrasoft.Core.ContentGeneration.IConfigurationMetaInfoFileReader
member.summary: Provides methods to read runtime configuration client content meta info from file.

member.name: M:Terrasoft.Core.ContentGeneration.IConfigurationMetaInfoFileReader.Read(System.String)
member.summary: Reads runtime configuration client content meta info from file.
member.returns: Configuration meta info, if file exists. Otherwise returns null.

member.name: T:Terrasoft.Core.ContentGeneration.IConfigurationMetaInfoFileWriter
member.summary: Provides methods to write runtime configuration client content meta info to file.

member.name: M:Terrasoft.Core.ContentGeneration.IConfigurationMetaInfoFileWriter.Write(Terrasoft.Core.ContentGeneration.ConfigurationMetaInfo,System.String)
member.summary: Writes runtime configuration client content meta info to file.
member.param: Configuration meta info which should be written to file.

member.name: T:Terrasoft.Core.ContentGeneration.IConfigurationMetaInfoReader
member.summary: Provides methods to read runtime configuration client meta content.

member.name: M:Terrasoft.Core.ContentGeneration.IConfigurationMetaInfoReader.Read(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Reads runtime configuration client meta content.

member.name: T:Terrasoft.Core.ContentGeneration.IConfigurationMetaInfoWriter
member.summary: Provides methods to write runtime configuration client content meta info to stream.

member.name: M:Terrasoft.Core.ContentGeneration.IConfigurationMetaInfoWriter.Write(Terrasoft.Core.ContentGeneration.ConfigurationMetaInfo,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Writes runtime configuration client content meta info to stream.
member.param: Configuration meta info which should be saved to stream.
Instance of to write content to.
